title: Identify What We Are Looking For

title: Translate into a System of Equations
text: The sum of the two numbers is -45: $$n+m=-45$$.
speech: The sum of the two numbers is -45: , n plus m, is equal to negative 45 .

title: Translate into a System of Equations
speech: Their difference is -89: , n minus m, is equal to negative 89 .

title: Solve the System of Equations
text: To solve the system of equations, use elimination. The equations are in standard form and the coefficients of $$m$$ are opposites.

title: Eliminate a Variable

title: Solve for $$n$$
text: $$m$$ will be eliminated and then solve for $$n$$.\n$$2n=-134$$\n$$n=-67$$

title: Substitute and Solve for $$m$$
text:
Substitute $$n=-67$$ into one of the original equations and solve for $$m$$.
$$n+m=-45$$
$$-67+m=-45$$
$$m=22$$
